data.title: Messenger, Instagram Movie Mate Lets Fans Scream Along With the Original Scream Film
data.meta_description: The franchise marks its 25th anniversary with the Jan. 14 theatrical release of Scream (2022).
data.text:
Facebook Creative Shop, fan platform Hello Sidney, Instagram, Messenger, Paramount Pictures and Spyglass Media Group teamed up on a Movie Mate second-screen experience, which debuted on Facebook and Instagram Monday.

Fans can access the Movie Mate by going to the Scream Movies Facebook page and clicking the Send Message button, or sending a direct message to @screammovies on Instagram.

Then, while streaming the original Scream film at home, Movie Mate syncs with the stream and shares behind-the-scenes moments, exclusive photos and entertaining facts about the movie.
